snippet: The British private equity firm Electra Partners says its funds will buy a stake in Hotter Shoes held by another private equity shop, Gresham, in a deal worth as much as 200 million pounds, according to a person familiar with the matter.
abstract: The British private equity firm Electra Partners says its funds will buy a stake in Hotter Shoes held by another private equity shop, Gresham, in a deal worth as much as 200 million pounds, according to a person familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Electra Partners to Take Majority Stake in British Shoemaker
